## mux variable

Merges bits of `a` and `b`<!-- -->, selecting bits from `b` where `mask` bits are set.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mux: (a: number, b: number, mask: number) => number
```

## Example


```ts
mux(0x12345678, 0xaaaa5555, 0xffff0000)
// 0xaaaa5678

mux(0x12345678, 0xaaaa5555, 0x0000ffff)
// 0x12345555

```
